atbat.des: Jason Bartlett called out on strikes.
Chase Headley flies out to left fielder Darnell McDonald.
Ryan Ludwick singles on a soft line drive to left fielder Darnell McDonald.
Jesus Guzman grounds into a force out, second baseman Dustin Pedroia to shortstop Marco Scutaro. Ryan Ludwick out at 2nd.
Dustin Pedroia grounds into a force out, second baseman Orlando Hudson to shortstop Jason Bartlett. Jacoby Ellsbury out at 2nd. Dustin Pedroia to 1st.

pitch.cc: Cory Luebke is really trying to keep Jacoby Ellsbury close; he has 24 SB in 33 attempts this season.

atbat.des: Adrian Gonzalez doubles (25) on a fly ball to left fielder Ryan Ludwick. Dustin Pedroia scores.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Ernesto Frieri replaces Cory Luebke.

atbat.des: Kevin Youkilis flies out to left fielder Ryan Ludwick.

pitch.cc: Ernesto Frieri may have to go after Kevin Youkilis, who's hitting .256 this season, with the four-seam fastball here rather than facing David Ortiz, who's hitting .315 this season.
Ernesto Frieri battled back from 3-0 to retire Kevin Youkilis.

atbat.des: Ernesto Frieri intentionally walks David Ortiz.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter J. D. Drew replaces Darnell McDonald.

atbat.des: J. D. Drew walks. Adrian Gonzalez to 3rd. David Ortiz to 2nd.
Marco Scutaro hit by pitch. Adrian Gonzalez scores. David Ortiz to 3rd. J. Drew to 2nd.
Jason Varitek hit by pitch. David Ortiz scores. J. Drew to 3rd. Marco Scutaro to 2nd.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Evan Scribner replaces Ernesto Frieri.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Josh Reddick replaces Mike Cameron.

atbat.des: Josh Reddick singles on a line drive to center fielder Cameron Maybin. J. D. Drew scores. Marco Scutaro scores. Jason Varitek to 2nd.
Jacoby Ellsbury singles on a line drive to left fielder Ryan Ludwick. Jason Varitek to 3rd. Josh Reddick to 2nd.
Dustin Pedroia walks. Jason Varitek scores. Josh Reddick to 3rd. Jacoby Ellsbury to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Evan Scribner showed faith in Nick Hundley by throwing that curveball in the dirt with a runner on 3rd.

atbat.des: Adrian Gonzalez singles on a line drive to right fielder Chris Denorfia. Josh Reddick scores. Jacoby Ellsbury scores. Dustin Pedroia to 2nd.
Kevin Youkilis doubles (20) on a line drive to left fielder Ryan Ludwick. Dustin Pedroia scores. Adrian Gonzalez scores.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Drew Sutton replaces Kevin Youkilis.
Pitcher Change: Pat Neshek replaces Evan Scribner.

pitch.cc: Pat Neshek is getting a generous strike zone this inning from home plate ump Ed Rapuano.
